title: Hamza's Hair Salon
short_description: Hamza's Hair Salon is a full service salon that offers a wide range of services. We are located in the heart of downtown Melbourne.
long_description: Hamza's Hair Salon is a full service salon that offers a wide range of services. We are located in the heart of downtown Melbourne. We are a family owned and operated business that has been in the community for over 20 years. We are a full service salon that offers a wide range of services. reviews.name: John Doe
reviews.review: This is a great salon. I have been going here for years and I have never had a bad experience. The staff is very friendly and the stylists are very knowledgeable. I highly recommend this salon.
